Property.name: ignore_time_stamps
Property.description: Ignored/drops timestamps, disabling the timegating functionality.

Property.name: time_correction
Property.description: unsigned fixed point fraction of second which is subtracted from the applied time to open the gate early so that the actual RF transmission happens at the right time

Property.name: late_time_sticky
Property.description: Timestamp (corrected) arrived too late - after the indicated time

Property.name: clr_late_time_sticky
Property.description: Writing a value of true clears correction_overflow_sticky.

Property.name: force_error_on_invalid_time_at_start
Property.description: Forces worker into the unusable state if the time invalid signal is low during the worker initialized state.
